answer: Los Angeles, hunh? Maybe we should stake out Clint Eastwood's place. Didn't he used to drive around with a monkey that'd punch people and drink beer?

question: Am, uh--Am I on speaker phone?
answer: No way--Dunston!

question: Alright, now that's not fair. I know I didn't make it as high up as you guys, but my job's just as important.
answer: Calm down, Will. Don't go all... bananas on us!

question: I come to you as a friend--as a fellow professional--and this is the shit I get?!
answer: You're right, Will. Tell you what-- we'll get our best man on your case right away. You might've heard of him. He's a doctor.

question: Oh, a doctor?
answer: His name's Doctor Zaius!

question: Where are we taking it from, Gus? You're a true artist, Gus
answer: Just take it from "It's a good course."

question: Oh, now you're the director.
answer: Hey, shove it. Bounce-boy. Let's remember who talked who into doing this shit in the first place. Talking me into Dogma was one thing, but this--

question: I'm sorry this is taking you away from whatever-gay-killers-on-horses- who-like-to-play-golf-touchy-feely- flick you're supposed to be doing this week.
answer: Oh--I'm touchy-feely? I take it you never saw Forces of Nature?

question: You're like a child. What've I been telling you? Sometimes you've gotta do the safe picture. Sometimes, you do it for art. Sometimes, it's the payback picture your friend says you owe him-- And sometimes, you go back to the well.
answer: And sometimes, you do Reindeer Games.

question: She's fucking hot, man. If I was you, I'd been like-- What, man? You never did one of these? Holy shit? You're the Dawson!
answer: It's James, actually. James Van Der Beek.

question: Yo, what's up with Pacey stealing Joey away from you? If I was you, I would've drowned his ass in your Creek and shit!
answer: I know, Because what--is Josh better looking than me? Fuck, no. I mean, who on earth is better looking that me? I ask you.

question: Joey, man! She's too fine! Yo--did you ever get to third base with her?
answer: Well, there was this one time-- Wait a second--who are you guys?!

question: The movie we start shooting in a few minutes--Bluntman and Chronic Strike Back.
answer: You're doubling me. I'm playing Bluntman, AKA Silent Bill.

question: Bob
answer: Right. And he's playing Chronic. AKA Ray.

question: Jay! Shit, did you even read the script?
answer: There's a script?

question: What's with the weird, gay huddle going on over there?
answer: What's gay about it? It's two guys talking in a corner. Man--why are you such a homophobe.

question: I'm not a homophobe.
answer: You are. You're always calling things gay. "Ooo--look at the gay huddle, dude!"

question: Hey--look at the monkey.
answer: Next you're going to tell me the monkey's gay.

question: Uh--yeah. They're in here.
answer: Do they have you hostage? Should we call your publicists?

question: NO! I mean, we kicked those guys' asses bad. They're--knocked out.
answer: Great work, sirs! If you let us in, we'll take over--

question: NO! Me and Jason Biggs are naked in here! Together!
answer: Uh--okay. We'll just be--outside the door, sirs.

question: An inker? What, like you trace? I don't see 'em. Where are they?
answer: This must've set 'em back a couple hundred bucks.

question: Look at this shit. A gay hood ornament, and the color Purple.
answer: Who the fuck are you?

question: Who the fuck am I? I'm the fucking director, is who I am. Chaka Luther King. The creator of all of this.
answer: Wait a sec--I thought Holden and Banky created this shit.

question: And I'm stealing it. I'm taking it back for all the shit you people have stolen from us! Did you know, I came up with the idea for Sesame Street before PBS? I was going to call it N.W.P.--Niggaz with Puppets. Alright--enough small talk. Let's shoot it.
answer: Wait, wait, wait!! Aren't you gonna direct us?

question: I'll be directing you to the food stamps line after I fire your ass, if you talk back like that to me again!
answer: But we don't know what we're supposed to do here. We didn't even read the script.

question: So? Neither did I. Shit, neither did the studio. Look man, it's not hard. In this scene, the bad guy breaks into the Bluntcave. You make up some shit, fight him for a while, I film it, I yell "cut," and then head back to my trailer, where I got more white women waiting for me there than the first lifeboat off the Titanic! They all want a part of the movie, and I got just the part for 'em. LET'S ROLL WITH THE NEW! ACTION! Damn! Now that was one special effect! This picture's gonna make House Party look like House Party Two! Shut the fuck up!
answer: YO-BITCH-FISTS! Call me Darth Balls. Bunngg.

question: What's it gonna be, Sissy? Which fighting style do you want me to kick your ass in?
answer: Are you kidding me? I taught you all all your moves myself. There's not a style you can bust that I can't defend against.

question: You're no match for my "Shaolin Monk."
answer: Yeah, but I can bury you with my "Crouching Tiger."

question: A little "Venus's--flytrap"?
answer: I'll counter with "Dragon Crane."

question: How about a little "Bitch, My Man Ain't Yo Baby's Daddy"?
answer: Bring it on.

question: Yo--I hope one of 'em rips the other one's shirt off and we see some tit.
answer: Mister Biggs? Mister Van Der Beek? I just wanted to say hi. I'm--

question: Banky fucking Edwards! Just the motherfucker we came to see!
answer: Holy shit! What the fuck are you guys doing here?! Stop the movie?! Are you crazy?!

question: All these assholes are calling us names on the Internet, 'cause of this stupid movie!
answer: I feel for you boys--I really do. Those Net snipers can be really cruel. But Miramax paid me a shitload of money for Bluntman and Chronic, so it occurs to me that people bad- mouthing you on some web-site is none of my FUCKING CONCERN!

question: Yeah.
answer: So, what do you guys want, to go away and take your lady friends with you?

question: Shitcan this movie so we don't get called names on the Internet anymore.
answer: Even if there's no movie, people are still free to talk shit about you on the Internet. That's what the Internet's for

question: Well this isn't fair! We went to Hollywood, I fell in love, we stole a monkey, we got shot at, and got punched in the motherfucking nuts! We ain't leaving empty-handed! What's up baby? You look good!
answer: Isn't that your girlfriend's enemy?

question: Oh yeah. Get the fuck offa me, pig!
answer: You guys are gonna ruin my movie career.

question: Well, we want something for our mental anguish.
answer: Tell you what

question: Half?!?
answer: Half's not good enough? Fine--I'll give you two-thirds of what I made!

question: Fuck-you--you already said half? You can't take it back!
answer: Done

question: No. I'm tired of running. You awake, Marshal? Marshal?
answer: Oh my God, I'm paralyzed. The monkey shot me in the ass and paralyzed me! Oh the irony!

question: You're not paralyzed. It was just a tranquilizer.
answer: Jesus! Tranqued by a little monkey! My friends in the Bureau are never gonna let me live this down!

question: You have friends in the F.B.I.?
answer: They all made it in, but I failed the exam. Why the hell else do you think I became a Federal Wildlife Marshal? 'Cause I'm a joke!

question: Maybe not. I can make you a deal that'll get you into the F.B.I., regardless of test scores.
answer: What kind of deal?

question: For him? I'd be willing to do anything. I'm an international jewel thief who's facing a jail sentence.
answer: That's alright. I'm a junkie with a monkey.

question: If I go to prison, will you wait for me?
answer: I don't know. Will we fuck when you get out? Don't change the subject. Will we fuck when you get out?

question: What--here?
answer: Well, boys--you're rich in love-- Well, you're in love. And to top that off, you've got your own monkey. What more could two guys from Jersey possibly want?

question: All those fucks to stop talking shit about us on the Internet, for starters.
answer: What do I keep telling you? There's not much you can do to stop that. Well, short of showing up at all their houses and beating the shit out of them, I guess.

question: You know--with all that money we're gonna make we can buy a lotta plane tickets.
answer: Can I help you?

question: Yes. Ma'am, Does-- William Dusky live here?
answer: Yes. He's my son.

question: May we talk to him, please.
answer: One moment.

question: Yeah?
answer: Yo--do you post as-- Magnolia-Fan on Movie Poop Shoot.com?

question: Yeah.
answer: And did you write "Fuck Jay and Silent Bob. Fuck them up their stupid asses?

question: Yeah, a while ago. So?
answer: On Movie Poop Shoot.com. did you say Jay and Silent Bob-- "--are fucking clown shoes. If they were real, I'd beat the shit out of them for being so stupid."

question: Yeah.
answer: Really--

question: Now that was worse then Clash of the Titans.
answer: I still can't believe Judy Dench played me.

question: Hey--remind me to renew that restraining order.
answer: Why?
